title: Power to the Nodes
description: Matt Hill, CEO of Start9, breaks down the true political power of running a Bitcoin node. From user sovereignty to censorship resistance, this talk explores why nodes matter more than you think.

title: Coinbase Hack
description: A major Coinbase hack & cover-up has just been exposed, and it's worse than you think. Matt Hill, Brian De Mint, and Ant join BTC Sessions to break down what happened.

title: You need to run your own Node
description: How easy it is to setup your very own Bitcoin Node.

title: Own Your Data With Start9 A Sovereign Computing Revolution
description: In this episode of the Build-a-Mine podcast, your host Trevor Bello dives deep into the transformative world of sovereign computing with Matt Hill, founder of Start9.

title: Why you should run a node
description: Michael Saylor pitches Microsoft on Microstrategy's Bitcoin playbook and why they should buy Bitcoin to ad value to their shareholders. With Matt Hill on why you should run a node.

title: Talking with Matt Hill: Empowering Sovereignty w/ Bitcoin Nodes, Privacy, and El Salvador’s Future
description: In this episode, we welcome Matt Hill, CEO of Start9, to discuss how sovereign computing can enhance privacy, self-sovereignty, and Bitcoin adoption. We explore Node Nation in El Salvador, where students are running Bitcoin nodes in public schools, and how this could shape the future of financial education.

title: How Big Tech uses your data to control your digital life | Anjan Katta & Matt Hill
description: This talk discusses the shrinking wold of online freedom, censorship and ownership over your personal online presence. Today's guest Matt Hill is Founder of Start 9 Sovereign Computing whose mission it is to end the need for trusted third parties creating a more decentralized future for  all! Here on the podcast we're all about taking control of your health and wealth and Matt Hill is fueling the fire for individualized approaches to achieving these goals.

title: Matt Hill and Craig LeBlanc
description: Matt Hill of Start9 Interviewed By Craig LeBlanc The DoorMan w The Bitcoin Daily Show.

title: Starting Fresh with Start 9
description: Welcome to the The Confab, the term derives from 'confidential talk', which was commonly used in the Prohibition Era for meetings and conversations that took place in the smoky, rule-breaking speakeasies of that time. The informal, privacy focused and clandestine nature of Ungovernable Misfits lends itself to these discussions. So, grab a seat and a stiff drink from the concealed bar, listen and revel in the conversation.

title: Self-hosting, Start9, and StartOS
